data.text: "Be realistic, Tap."
data.name: American Friend
data.processed: <story>"Be realistic, Tap."

data.text:
(I'm sick of hearing that. 
I'm just going to Japan, that's all.)
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
<story>(I'm sick of hearing that. 
<story>I'm just going to Japan, that's all.)

data.text:
"You might regret this, Tap. Chasing your 'dreams' to Japan? 
Come on, we're not kids anymore. 
You don't have any friends over there, either!"
data.name: American Friend
data.processed:
<story>"You might regret this, Tap. Chasing your 'dreams' to Japan? 
<story>Come on, we're not kids anymore. 
<story>You don't have any friends over there, either!"

data.text:
(I'm not giving up on my dreams. 
There's no chance I'll ever give up this adventure!)
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
<story>(I'm not giving up on my dreams. 
<story>There's no chance I'll ever give up this adventure!)

data.text: Pardon! What is there to eat around here?
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: Pardon! What is there to eat around here?

data.text: A-ah... Aimu so-ri...? Ai kyanto supi-ku ingurisshu...
data.name: Passerby
data.processed: A-ah... Aimu so-ri...? Ai kyanto supi-ku ingurisshu...

data.text:
(I don't need any friends. I don't need to get my words across. 
All that matters is that I'm here...)
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
<story>(I don't need any friends. I don't need to get my words across. 
<story>All that matters is that I'm here...)

data.text: (...I'm fine by myself.)
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: <story>(...I'm fine by myself.)

data.text: Ah... You... alone? Come, eat... together?
data.name: Girl with pigtails
data.processed: Ah... You... alone? Come, eat... together?

data.text:
Hey, you're just speaking Japanese! 
Um... Ramen, eat?
data.name: Girl with a ponytail
data.processed:
<story>Hey, you're just speaking Japanese! 
<story>Um... Ramen, eat?

data.text:
(Even though I was all alone, they taught me some Japanese. 
They took me along to play. They became... my friends!)
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
<story>(Even though I was all alone, they taught me some Japanese. 
<story>They took me along to play. They became... my friends!)

data.text: (Sorry!! I was wrong after all! Having friends is better than solitude! Being alone was so boring!)
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: (Sorry!! I was wrong after all! Having friends is better than solitude! Being alone was so boring!)

data.text: (I'm going to live life laughing together with my friends!)
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: <story>(I'm going to live life laughing together with my friends!)

data.text:
I'm sorry, my mom is taking me to Hokkaido, so... 
I don't think we'll see each other again... Bye-bye, Tap.
data.name: Girl with a ponytail
data.processed:
<story>I'm sorry, my mom is taking me to Hokkaido, so... 
<story>I don't think we'll see each other again... Bye-bye, Tap.

data.text:
(I can't believe it... Snatched away by such fickle things 
like time, or circumstances...!)
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
<story>(I can't believe it... Snatched away by such fickle things 
<story>like time, or circumstances...!)

data.text:
(I've had it with "reality". I'll fight it head-on. 
It's my journey, my desire!)
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
<story>(I've had it with "reality". I'll fight it head-on. 
<story>It's my journey, my desire!)

data.text: Listen up! I'm going to absolutely crush the biggest of races! The Takarazuka Kinen, Japan Cup, and the Arima Kinen... I'll win them all!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: Listen up! I'm going to absolutely crush the biggest of races! The Takarazuka Kinen, Japan Cup, and the Arima Kinen... I'll win them all!

data.text: ... Tap!
data.name: Girl with pigtails
data.processed: <story>... Tap!

data.text: But! You have to be famous to enter them, right? Then I'll become a record breaker! I'll make everyone go wild!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: But! You have to be famous to enter them, right? Then I'll become a record breaker! I'll make everyone go wild!

data.text:
I'll become someone the likes of which the world has never seen! 
I'll help myself to records, popularity and above all: Adventure!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
<story>I'll become someone the likes of which the world has never seen! 
<story>I'll help myself to records, popularity and above all: Adventure!

data.text: And then! I'll be famous the world over! Sponsors, commercials, all the money will come to me!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: And then! I'll be famous the world over! Sponsors, commercials, all the money will come to me!

data.text: Well, Trainer? What do you think? How much money do you think the world's best horsegirl will bring in?
data.name: Tap Dance City

choices.text: More than anyone else, I bet!

data.processed: Well, Trainer? What do you think? How much money do you think the world's best horsegirl will bring in?

data.text: Exactly! With that much money, I'll build that castle in no time!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: Exactly! With that much money, I'll build that castle in no time!

data.text:
... Tap! 
I get what you mean, but there's no way...
data.name: Girl with pigtails
data.processed:
<story>... Tap! 
<story>I get what you mean, but there's no way...

data.text: Come. I'll take you to my castle!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: <story>Come. I'll take you to my castle!

data.text:
Being a kid or an adult. Reality or ideals. 
Don't waste your time on these pointless things! 
I won't accept your farewell!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
<story>Being a kid or an adult. Reality or ideals. 
<story>Don't waste your time on these pointless things! 
<story>I won't accept your farewell!

data.text:
I'll make sure to build that castle where we can have fun forever! 
All you need to do is trust in me, and tell me you'll see me again!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
<story>I'll make sure to build that castle where we can have fun forever! 
<story>All you need to do is trust in me, and tell me you'll see me again!

data.name: Girl with pigtails
data.processed: <story>...!

data.text:
You, Trainer, let's make a killing! 
And we'll make your dream come true while we're at it!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
<story>You, Trainer, let's make a killing! 
<story>And we'll make your dream come true while we're at it!

data.text:
Don't you think your goals are a bit of a stretch? 
Not only mastering the G1 class, but even a record 
and going overseas, too...?
data.name: Veteran Trainer A
data.processed:
<story>Don't you think your goals are a bit of a stretch? 
<story>Not only mastering the G1 class, but even a record 
<story>and going overseas, too...?

data.text:
I firmly grasp the hand that's right in front of me. The hand 
of the horsegirl who said she'd make my dream come true. 
The dream I was told was impossible.

choices.text: You make it sound like you're fulfilled mine.
choices.processed: <size=38>You make it sound like you're fulfilled mine.</size>

choices.text: You make it sound like you're fulfilled mine.
choices.processed: <size=38>You make it sound like you're fulfilled mine.</size>

data.processed:
<story>I firmly grasp the hand that's right in front of me. The hand 
<story>of the horsegirl who said she'd make my dream come true. 
<story>The dream I was told was impossible.

data.text:
All I need to make our dreams come true is money. 
And a trainer who aims for the top, too!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
<story>All I need to make our dreams come true is money. 
<story>And a trainer who aims for the top, too!

data.text:
This is beyond reckless. But her confident smile... 
She might really be suited to become the ruler of the races.
data.processed:
<story>This is beyond reckless. But her confident smile... 
<story>She might really be suited to become the ruler of the races.

data.text:
A few days later. Tap Dance City is about to do a mock race 
with fellow classmates and upperclassmen 
in the lead-up to her debut.
data.processed:
<story>A few days later. Tap Dance City is about to do a mock race 
<story>with fellow classmates and upperclassmen 
<story>in the lead-up to her debut.

data.text:
Argh! 5th place again! How many times in a row is that? 
I thought it'd be a piece of cake with your strategy!
data.name: Tap Dance City

choices.text: Well, let's try to be a little realistic.

data.processed:
<story>Argh! 5th place again! How many times in a row is that? 
<story>I thought it'd be a piece of cake with your strategy!

data.text:
We've been working together, but the only races she's won so far 
are the ones with her friends. We're still lacking in both 
power and strategy for the Twinkle Series.

choices.text: Let's go over some data for now.
Let's go over some data for now.

data.processed:
<story>We've been working together, but the only races she's won so far 
<story>are the ones with her friends. We're still lacking in both 
<story>power and strategy for the Twinkle Series.

data.text:
We brainstormed with data about her future opponents. 
And data about herself too, because we need to find a plan 
that brings out her best.
data.processed:
<story>We brainstormed with data about her future opponents. 
<story>And data about herself too, because we need to find a plan 
<story>that brings out her best.

data.text:
From the data I gathered during her mock races, I noticed something. 
Her biggest weakness is is being thrown off her pace by others.

choices.text: (She has to stay in her comfort zone.)
(She has to stay in her comfort zone.)

data.processed:
<story>From the data I gathered during her mock races, I noticed something. 
<story>Her biggest weakness is is being thrown off her pace by others.

data.text: Hmm? What's up, Trainer?
data.name: Tap Dance City

choices.text: I was just thinking how confident you are.
choices.processed: <size=39>I was just thinking how confident you are.</size>

choices.text: I was just thinking how confident you are.
choices.processed: <size=39>I was just thinking how confident you are.</size>

data.processed: <story>Hmm? What's up, Trainer?

data.text:
Heh... What's a journey without riding the turbulent waves? 
I'll leave the steering to you.
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
<story>Heh... What's a journey without riding the turbulent waves? 
<story>I'll leave the steering to you.

data.text:
So they managed to find one, eh? I wonder if they'll be okay with 
Tap Dance City. She's been losing a lot, and her debut is coming up...
data.name: Veteran Trainer A
data.processed:
<story>So they managed to find one, eh? I wonder if they'll be okay with 
<story>Tap Dance City. She's been losing a lot, and her debut is coming up...

data.text:
Bwah-ha-ha! I'm sure they're learning their lesson! 
It's hard to stay motivated if your horsegirl keeps losing!
data.name: Veteran Trainer B
data.processed:
<story>Bwah-ha-ha! I'm sure they're learning their lesson! 
<story>It's hard to stay motivated if your horsegirl keeps losing!

data.text: ... Are we really seein' the same thing, with comments like that?
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed: <story>... Are we really seein' the same thing, with comments like that?

data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>(She's gaining experience racing against those stronger than her, 
<story>and she's improving abnormally fast. She may already be ready 
<story>for the Derby right now...)

data.text:
... 
Tap Dance City, Classic Races, Derb――
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>... 
<story>Tap Dance City, Classic Races, Derb――

data.text:
No, she should already be in 'Parcae'. She should have 
nothing to do with my 'seven centimeters'... Surely.
data.name: Air Shakur
data.processed:
<story>No, she should already be in 'Parcae'. She should have 
<story>nothing to do with my 'seven centimeters'... Surely.

data.text: ――A single encounter may be able to change fate.
data.processed: <story>――A single encounter may be able to change fate.

data.text:
Tap Dance City's decision to come to Japan was caused 
by Katsuragi Ace. Then, she met new friends in Japan 
and developed her dream of building a castle.
data.processed:
<story>Tap Dance City's decision to come to Japan was caused 
<story>by Katsuragi Ace. Then, she met new friends in Japan 
<story>and developed her dream of building a castle.

data.text: Every encounter just like that, shifts fate in a new direction.
data.processed: <story>Every encounter just like that, shifts fate in a new direction.

data.text: I arrived in... Japan. Ahead of schedule, even...
data.name: Symboli Kris S
data.processed: I arrived in... Japan. Ahead of schedule, even...

data.text: ――Sometimes even in an unexpected direction...
data.processed: <story>――Sometimes even in an unexpected direction...
